mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_id as feedId , A.contents as contents , A.location as location , A.created_at as createdAt , B.user_id as writerUserId , IF(B.nick_name IS NULL, b.uid,b.nick_name) AS writerNm , B.pic as writerPic , if(c.feed_id IS NULL,0,1) AS isLike FROM feed A INNER JOIN user B ON A.writer_user_id=B.user_id Left JOIN feed_like c ON c.feed_id=a.feed_id AND c.user_id=#{signedUserId} ORDER BY A.feed_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx},#{size}
